name: Understanding Employment Contracts and Pay Structures
description: This quiz tests your knowledge on different types of employment contracts in the UK, the differences between part-time and full-time work, and how overtime pay is calculated.

questions.question: Which of the following is true about zero-hour contracts in the UK?
options: They guarantee a fixed number of hours per week.
They provide the same employment rights as full-time contracts.
They offer flexibility but no guaranteed hours.
They are only available to full-time workers.
questions.correct_option: They offer flexibility but no guaranteed hours.
